page.title: 15Employment in Inchnadamph.
page.content: There are{19 people}living in Inchnadamph.{1:3}is the ratio of children to adults.{10%}of the population are fully retired. The biggest employers are the Estates and the hotel. The{Estates }employ 1 gamekeeper and 1 shepherd while the {hotel}employs about 10 people in the summer. Tourism is therefore very important and there are three holiday homes and one "bed & breakfast" house and one caravan to let. Holiday homes are cleaned out by local women. In the summer also there is more passing trade eg.hikers, cyclists and campers. Most depopulation here took place during the{"Clearences" of 1812-1819 when{143 people}(sub-tenants) were relieved of their land to make way for sheep. Population in{1774 was 79,}in {1811 was 169,}in{1841 was 26,}in{1861 {was 19 }and in{1881 was 32.
